name: Greg
description: Hi, my name is Greg. I have been working in aged care for over 10 years. My passion is to provide compassionate care and support to the elderly, ensuring they live with dignity and comfort.

name: Sophia
description: Hello, I'm Sophia. With a background in nursing, I've dedicated the last 8 years to senior care. I take pride in creating a safe and nurturing environment for the elderly.

name: Liam
description: My name is Liam. I have been a rehabilitation assistant in aged care for 6 years. I focus on helping seniors regain mobility and independence through personalized exercise programs.

name: Emily
description: Hi, I'm Emily. With 5 years of experience in dementia care, I am committed to providing specialized support to those with memory loss, helping them and their families navigate this challenging journey.
